$note: High-level tool registry. Playwright methods are handled dynamically by playwright_execute.

playwright_execute.description: Universal browser automation tool. Use this single tool for ALL browser actions by specifying the method parameter. Supports: goto (navigate), click, fill, press, evaluate (run JavaScript), screenshot, wait_for_selector, inner_text, and 100+ Playwright methods
playwright_execute.usage_note: This is ONE tool that handles all browser actions. Do not use 'playwright_goto' or 'playwright_click' as separate tools - use 'playwright_execute' with method parameter

parameter_format.method: string (REQUIRED) - Playwright method name: goto, click, fill, press, evaluate, screenshot, wait_for_selector, inner_text, etc.
parameter_format.url: string (optional) - URL for navigation (used with method='goto')
parameter_format.selector: string (optional) - CSS selector for element (used with click, fill, press, etc.)
parameter_format.args: object (optional) - Method-specific arguments (e.g., {value: 'text'} for fill, {key: 'Enter'} for press, {expression: 'code'} for evaluate)

google_search.description: Search Google for information and get URLs, snippets, and text results

chart_extractor.description: Extract structured data (tables, lists, charts) from webpages with specified fields

api_call.description: Make HTTP API requests (GET/POST/PUT/DELETE) with query parameters and JSON responses

calculator.description: Perform mathematical calculations and evaluate expressions

content_extractor.description: Extract clean, readable content from web pages for research and analysis. Removes scripts, styles, and HTML clutter while preserving semantic content.

parameter_format.url: string (required) - URL to extract content from

excel_export.description: Export data to Excel file (.xlsx format)

parameter_format.data: array (required) - Array of records to export
array (required) - Array of records to export
